</div>
</div>

<script>
let currentSlide = 0;
let slidesToShow = 3;
let totalSlides = 0;

function initCarousel() {
  const track = document.querySelector('.news-carousel-track');
  const slides = document.querySelectorAll('.news-slide');
  const dotsContainer = document.querySelector('.carousel-dots');
  
  if (!track || !slides.length) return;
  
  totalSlides = slides.length;
  const maxSlide = totalSlides - slidesToShow;
  
  // Create dots for each possible position
  dotsContainer.innerHTML = '';
  for (let i = 0; i <= maxSlide; i++) {
    const dot = document.createElement('span');
    dot.className = 'carousel-dot';
    if (i === 0) dot.classList.add('active');
    dot.onclick = () => goToSlide(i);
    dotsContainer.appendChild(dot);
  }
  
  // Force initial update
  currentSlide = 0;
  updateCarousel();
  
  // Ensure layout is calculated
  setTimeout(() => updateCarousel(), 100);
}

function updateCarousel() {
  const track = document.querySelector('.news-carousel-track');
  const slides = document.querySelectorAll('.news-slide');
  
  if (!track || !slides.length) return;
  
  // Get actual slide width from first slide
  const firstSlide = slides[0];
  const slideWidth = firstSlide.offsetWidth;
  const offset = -currentSlide * slideWidth;
  
  track.style.transform = `translateX(${offset}px)`;
  
  // Update dots
  const dots = document.querySelectorAll('.carousel-dot');
  dots.forEach((dot, index) => {
    dot.classList.toggle('active', index === currentSlide);
  });
  
  // Update button states
  const prevBtn = document.querySelector('.carousel-btn-prev');
  const nextBtn = document.querySelector('.carousel-btn-next');
  const maxSlide = totalSlides - slidesToShow;
  
  if (prevBtn && nextBtn) {
    prevBtn.style.opacity = currentSlide === 0 ? '0.3' : '1';
    nextBtn.style.opacity = currentSlide >= maxSlide ? '0.3' : '1';
    prevBtn.style.cursor = currentSlide === 0 ? 'default' : 'pointer';
    nextBtn.style.cursor = currentSlide >= maxSlide ? 'default' : 'pointer';
  }
}

function moveCarousel(direction) {
  const maxSlide = totalSlides - slidesToShow;
  currentSlide += direction;
  if (currentSlide < 0) currentSlide = 0;
  if (currentSlide > maxSlide) currentSlide = maxSlide;
  updateCarousel();
}

function goToSlide(index) {
  currentSlide = index;
  updateCarousel();
}

// Initialize on page load
if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initCarousel);
} else {
  initCarousel();
}

// Responsive: adjust slides shown on smaller screens
function handleResize() {
  const width = window.innerWidth;
  if (width < 768) {
    slidesToShow = 1;
  } else if (width < 1024) {
    slidesToShow = 2;
  } else {
    slidesToShow = 3;
  }
  currentSlide = Math.min(currentSlide, totalSlides - slidesToShow);
  initCarousel();
}

window.addEventListener('resize', handleResize);
window.addEventListener('load', initCarousel);
handleResize();
</script>
